com.github.tilastokeskus.minotaurus.scenario

Class TestScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tilastokeskus.minotaurus.scenario.AbstractScenario
      • com.github.tilastokeskus.minotaurus.scenario.TestScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin, Scenario, Cloneable

    public class TestScenario
extends AbstractScenario
    A Scenario intended for testing runners with. In this scenario, a goal is randomly spawned in the maze and the runners' job is to gather it. When the goal is gathered, a new one spawns in an unoccupied space.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.github.tilastokeskus.minotaurus.scenario.AbstractScenario

      • setMaze

        public void setMaze(Maze maze)
        Description copied from interface: Scenario
        Sets the maze this scenario should adjust to. A scenario needs the maze to place the specified runners, as well as do other scenario-specific actions, like placing goals.
        Specified by:
        setMaze in interface Scenario

        Parameters:

        public boolean handleRunnerMove(Runner runner,

        Description copied from interface: Scenario
        Attempts to move a runner in some direction. If the movement is not allowed, the runner is not moved.
        Parameters:
        runner - Runner to move.
        dir - Direction in which the runner should be moved to.
        Returns:
        True if the movement was allowed, false otherwise.
